amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Election Assistance Commission by $250,000 to be used for the training of college students to be poll workers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Election Assistance Commission by $250,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Millender-McDonald.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
